The Top 5 Reasons for Going Solar
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
From energy independence to electricity bill savings, there are countless reasons to go solar. It isn’t possible to cover every single reason—the list of potential benefits is way too long.
But when we asked our customers why they decided to go solar, certain patterns emerged. Take a look!
See 5 of the Most Popular Reasons to Go Solar: <[[http://www.directenergysolar.com/blog/post/the-top-5-reasons-for-going-solar?utm_medium=email&utm_source=top5reasons&utm_campaign=nurture-tk&utm_content=top5reasons-button-reasons]]>
“When we decided to get solar panels, our reasons were mostly financial. But now that we have them, it’s also psychological. The most rewarding part is that we’re generating energy from the sun!” - Uday and Arati
